author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Maoye Commercial to pay cash dividend of 0.15 yuan per share on April 25
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - Maoye Commercial Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 0.15 yuan per share (before tax) for 2017 to shareholders of record on April 24
* The companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on April 25 and the dividend will be paid on April 25
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/E5nzEk
